home.description: I have been studying for 2 years. During this journey, I created challenging projects that provided me with great learning and development of my skills and knowledge. I am a dedicated, creative person and always looking for new challenges, opportunities and learning.

about.description: ‚ÄúMy name is Luan Patrik, I'm 18 years old. My programming journey began when I started creating SAMP servers using the PAWN language. Since then I fell in love with the area. In 2021 I discovered web development through a friend and since then I started studying about it in an attempt to build a solid base of knowledge and information. During my studies in the area I learned a lot about the main languages and frameworks, they are HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Tailwind, React, Next.js and about APIs. I am constantly studying to improve and discover new features and languages to evolve professionally and personally.‚Äù.
about.author: Sincerely, Luan Patrik

Tabnews.description: Application developed in Next.js that offers users a simplified platform for publishing content. With an intuitive interface, TabNews makes reading news more efficient and enjoyable. The experience is optimized for mobile devices, ensuring easy access anywhere.
